mapper.select: SELECT id, file_id, files_hash, user_id, created_at, updated_at FROM files_owner WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND file_id = #{fileId} LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO files_owner (id, file_id, files_hash, user_id, created_at, updated_at) VALUES (#{id}, #{fileId}, #{filesHash}, #{userId}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM files_owner WHERE user_id = #{userId} AND file_id = #{fileId}
